name: ext_R3_ExplanationOfBenefit_benefitBalance
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.ExplanationOfBenefit.benefitBalance for use in FHIR R2
description: This cross-version extension represents ExplanationOfBenefit.benefitBalance from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ExplanationOfBenefit|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R2.
